verses.verse: And Saul<WH7586> spoke<WH1696> to<WH413> Jonathan<WH3083> his son,<WH1121> and to<WH413> all<WH3605> his servants,<WH5650> that they should kill<WH4191> <WH853> David.<WH1732>

But Jonathan<WH3083> Saul's<WH7586> son<WH1121> delighted<WH2654> much<WH3966> in David:<WH1732> and Jonathan<WH3083> told<WH5046> David,<WH1732> saying,<WH559> Saul<WH7586> my father<WH1> seeketh<WH1245> to kill<WH4191> thee: now<WH6258> therefore, I pray thee,<WH4994> take heed to thyself<WH8104> until the morning,<WH1242> and abide<WH3427> in a secret<WH5643> place, and hide thyself: <WH2244>

And I<WH589> will go out<WH3318> and stand<WH5975> beside<WH3027> my father<WH1> in the field<WH7704> where<WH834> <WH8033> thou<WH859> art, and I<WH589> will commune<WH1696> with<WH413> my father<WH1> of thee; and what<WH4100> I see,<WH7200> that I will tell<WH5046> thee.

And Jonathan<WH3083> spoke<WH1696> good<WH2896> of David<WH1732> unto<WH413> Saul<WH7586> his father,<WH1> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Let not<WH408> the king<WH4428> sin<WH2398> against his servant,<WH5650> against David;<WH1732> because<WH3588> he hath not<WH3808> sinned<WH2398> against thee, and because<WH3588> his works<WH4639> have been to thee-ward very<WH3966> good: <WH2896>

For he did put<WH7760> <WH853> his life<WH5315> in his hand,<WH3709> and slew<WH5221> <WH853> the Philistine,<WH6430> and the LORD<WH3068> wrought<WH6213> a great<WH1419> salvation<WH8668> for all<WH3605> Israel:<WH3478> thou sawest<WH7200> it, and didst rejoice:<WH8055> wherefore<WH4100> then wilt thou sin<WH2398> against innocent<WH5355> blood,<WH1818> to slay<WH4191> <WH853> David<WH1732> without a cause?<WH2600>
And Saul<WH7586> hearkened<WH8085> unto the voice<WH6963> of Jonathan:<WH3083> and Saul<WH7586> swore,<WH7650> As the LORD<WH3068> liveth,<WH2416> he shall not<WH518> be slain.<WH4191>

And Jonathan<WH3083> called<WH7121> David,<WH1732> and Jonathan<WH3083> showed<WH5046> him<WH853> all<WH3605> those<WH428> things.<WH1697> And Jonathan<WH3083> brought<WH935> <WH853> David<WH1732> to<WH413> Saul,<WH7586> and he was<WH1961> in his presence,<WH6440> as in times past.<WH8032> <WH865>

And there was<WH1961> war<WH4421> again:<WH3254> and David<WH1732> went out,<WH3318> and fought<WH3898> with the Philistines,<WH6430> and slew<WH5221> them with a great<WH1419> slaughter;<WH4347> and they fled<WH5127> from<WH4480> <WH6440> him.

And the evil<WH7451> spirit<WH7307> from the LORD<WH3068> was<WH1961> upon<WH413> Saul,<WH7586> as he<WH1931> sat<WH3427> in his house<WH1004> with his javelin<WH2595> in his hand:<WH3027> and David<WH1732> played<WH5059> with his hand.<WH3027>

And Saul<WH7586> sought<WH1245> to smite<WH5221> David<WH1732> even to the wall<WH7023> with the javelin;<WH2595> but he slipped away<WH6362> out of Saul's presence,<WH4480> <WH6440> <WH7586> and he smote<WH5221> <WH853> the javelin<WH2595> into the wall:<WH7023> and David<WH1732> fled,<WH5127> and escaped<WH4422> that<WH1931> night.<WH3915>

Saul <WH7586> also sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> unto<WH413> David's<WH1732> house,<WH1004> to watch<WH8104> him, and to slay<WH4191> him in the morning:<WH1242> and Michal<WH4324> David's<WH1732> wife<WH802> told<WH5046> him, saying,<WH559> If<WH518> thou save<WH4422> not<WH369> <WH853> thy life<WH5315> tonight,<WH3915> tomorrow<WH4279> thou<WH859> shalt be slain.<WH4191>
So Michal<WH4324> let David down<WH3381> <WH853> <WH1732> through<WH1157> a window:<WH2474> and he went,<WH1980> and fled,<WH1272> and escaped.<WH4422>

And Michal<WH4324> took<WH3947> <WH853> an image,<WH8655> and laid<WH7760> it in<WH413> the bed,<WH4296> and put<WH7760> a pillow<WH3523> of goats'<WH5795> hair for his bolster,<WH4763> and covered<WH3680> it with a cloth.<WH899>
And when Saul<WH7586> sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> to take<WH3947> <WH853> David,<WH1732> she said,<WH559> He<WH1931> is sick.<WH2470>

And Saul<WH7586> sent<WH7971> <WH853> the messengers<WH4397> again to see<WH7200> <WH853> David,<WH1732> saying,<WH559> Bring him up<WH5927> <WH853> to<WH413> me in the bed,<WH4296> that I may slay<WH4191> him.
And when the messengers<WH4397> were come in,<WH935> behold,<WH2009> there was an image<WH8655> in<WH413> the bed,<WH4296> with a pillow<WH3523> of goats'<WH5795> hair for his bolster.<WH4763>

And Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Michal,<WH4324> Why<WH4100> hast thou deceived<WH7411> me so,<WH3602> and sent away<WH7971> <WH853> mine enemy,<WH341> that he is escaped?<WH4422> And Michal<WH4324> answered<WH559> <WH413> Saul,<WH7586> He<WH1931> said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, Let me go;<WH7971> why<WH4100> should I kill<WH4191> thee?

So David<WH1732> fled,<WH1272> and escaped,<WH4422> and came<WH935> to<WH413> Samuel<WH8050> to Ramah,<WH7414> and told<WH5046> him<WH853> all<WH3605> that<WH834> Saul<WH7586> had done<WH6213> to him. And he<WH1931> and Samuel<WH8050> went<WH1980> and dwelt<WH3427> in Naioth.<WH5121>
And it was told<WH5046> Saul,<WH7586> saying,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> David<WH1732> is at Naioth<WH5121> in Ramah.<WH7414>

And Saul<WH7586> sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> to take<WH3947> <WH853> David:<WH1732> and when they saw<WH7200> <WH853> the company<WH3862> of the prophets<WH5030> prophesying,<WH5012> and Samuel<WH8050> standing<WH5975> as appointed<WH5324> over<WH5921> them, the Spirit<WH7307> of God<WH430> was<WH1961> upon<WH5921> the messengers<WH4397> of Saul,<WH7586> and they<WH1992> also<WH1571> prophesied.<WH5012>

And when it was told<WH5046> Saul,<WH7586> he sent<WH7971> other<WH312> messengers,<WH4397> and they<WH1992> prophesied<WH5012> likewise.<WH1571> And Saul<WH7586> sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> again<WH3254> the third<WH7992> time, and they<WH1992> prophesied<WH5012> also.<WH1571>

Then went<WH1980> he<WH1931> also<WH1571> to Ramah,<WH7414> and came<WH935> to<WH5704> a great<WH1419> well<WH953> that<WH834> is in Sechu:<WH7906> and he asked<WH7592> and said,<WH559> Where<WH375> are Samuel<WH8050> and David?<WH1732> And one said,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> they be at Naioth<WH5121> in Ramah.<WH7414>

And he went<WH1980> thither<WH8033> to<WH413> Naioth<WH5121> in Ramah:<WH7414> and the Spirit<WH7307> of God<WH430> was<WH1961> upon<WH5921> him<WH1931> also,<WH1571> and he went on,<WH1980> <WH1980> and prophesied,<WH5012> until<WH5704> he came<WH935> to Naioth<WH5121> in Ramah.<WH7414>

And he<WH1931> stripped off<WH6584> his clothes<WH899> also,<WH1571> and prophesied<WH5012> before<WH6440> Samuel<WH8050> in like manner,<WH1571> and lay down<WH5307> naked<WH6174> all<WH3605> that<WH1931> day<WH3117> and all<WH3605> that night.<WH3915> Wherefore<WH5921> <WH3651> they say,<WH559> Is Saul<WH7586> also<WH1571> among the prophets?<WH5030>
